text:
Cast of American Horror Story: Cult parties the night away at Cher Concert in Las Vegas







Stars Colton Haynes, Sarah Paulson, Billie Lourd, Billy Eichner and more hopped on over to Las Vegas to catch Cher in concert at the Monte Carlo Resort and Casino's Park Theater in Sin City.







www.eonline.com
title: Cast of American Horror Story: Cult parties the night away at Cher Concert in Las Vegas
